title: VR-Based Immersive Chinese Language Learning Program: Intermediate-Level Communication Skill Enhancement Using Productive Failure Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Comprehension of Chinese Characters and Simple Conversational Expressions
context.additional_context: Enhanced motivation through math-integrated cultural experiences, with VR environments built using digital devices (smartphones/tablets)

learning_goals: Utilize at least three strategic communication skills (contextual inference, non-verbal expression, L1-assisted translation) in a virtual reality environment to perform intermediate-level Mandarin conversations.
Over 80% of learners improve error-correction abilities through productive failure experiences during VR simulation problem-solving.
In summative evaluations, over 70% of participants show a 30% reduction in L1 dependency and decreased use of resource-lacking strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
